original_text:
Joker’s Jewels
Informazioni generali
Software: Pragmatic Play
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 5
Importo minimo della puntata: 0,01 €
Importo massimo della puntata: 25 €
Return to Player (RTP): 96,5%
Volatilità: alta
Caratteristiche principali
Se amate le vecchie slot machine terrestri e il loro stile, sia grafico che del gameplay, ma non siete particolarmente amanti delle tradizionali Fruit Machine, ecco un’altra tematica che ha conquistato generazioni di giocatori: il mondo delle pietre preziose e la simbologia legata alla figura del Joker. Questa tipologia di slot machine, nella quale si inserisce a pieno titolo anche Joker Jewels, non ha di certo tra i suoi punti di forza l’appariscenza e la complessità, ma anzi, la semplicità è la sua caratteristica più apprezzata.
Grafica lineare dunque, e gameplay molto intuitivo per una slot che con un return to player (RTP) del 96,5 % e una volatilità decisamente alta risulta competitiva per quanto riguarda le vincite.
Il giocatore può scommettere su ogni linea un numero di gettoni che va da uno a 10, con un valore compreso tra un minimo di 1 centesimo e un massimo di 0,50 €, per una scommessa fino a 25 € su tutte le cinque linee.
Simboli regolari e speciali di Joker Jewels
I simboli che si alternano sui rulli sono rappresentati da delle pietre preziose a cui si aggiungono le icone prettamente tematiche che si riferiscono alla figura del Joker.
Non sono presenti in questa slot machine i numeri e le lettere delle carte da gioco, che troviamo invece in praticamente tutti gli altri giochi di questo sviluppatore.
In alto sulla schermata principale è presente la tabella dei pagamenti che può essere consultata per scoprire il valore di ciascun simbolo: la maschera di Joker è quello che paga più di tutti, con una vincita pari a 50 € per un allineamento di cinque simboli, mentre quello che ha valore minore è rappresentato dalla gemma rotonda di colore blu scuro, che paga un massimo di 1 €.
Il gioco bonus
Nonostante il gameplay ridotto all’essenziale, Joker Jewels offre un gioco bonus, attivabile grazie allo Scatter, in questo caso una corona rossa su cui campeggia la scritta Bonus.
Non si tratta di un gioco bonus particolarmente articolato, ma prevede dei moltiplicatori che si attivano sulla vincita più elevata, permettendo al giocatore di ottenere delle vincite anche consistenti.
Slot simili a Joker Jewels
La figura del Joker è famosa nel mondo delle slot machine e sono diverse le software house che la propongono nei loro giochi.
Molto simile a Joker Jewels sia per quanto riguarda la grafica sia per il gameplay è Joker Gems: anche qui si alternano sui rulli delle pietre preziose e i simboli riguardanti la figura del Joker, in un gioco vintage semplice e intuitivo.
Se invece cercate qualcosa di più articolato sempre sullo stesso tema, vi suggeriamo Mega Joker della Novomatic, un gioco ad alto tasso adrenalinico adatto ai giocatori più intrepidi: si può puntare da un minimo di 0,20 € fino a un massimo di 100 € a giro, per un totale di 10 giri a sessione e inoltre è possibile rischiare il tutto per tutto su ogni vincita con la funzione “Lascia o raddoppia”.

raw_translation.response:
Joker’s Jewels
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 5
Minimum bet amount: €0.01
Maximum bet amount: €25
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: high
Main features
If you love old land-based slot machines and their graphic and gameplay style, but you are not particularly fond of traditional Fruit Machines, here's another theme that has enchanted generations of players: the world of gemstones and the symbolism related to the figure of the Joker. This type of slot machine, to which Joker Jewels fully belongs, does not have showiness or complexity among its strong points, but rather simplicity is the most appreciated feature.
Therefore, linear graphics and very intuitive gameplay for a slot that, with a return to player (RTP) of 96.5% and a decidedly high volatility, is competitive in terms of winnings.
The player can bet on each line a number of coins ranging from one to 10, with a value ranging from a minimum of 1 cent to a maximum of €0.50, for a bet of up to €25 on all five lines.
Regular and special symbols of Joker Jewels
The symbols that alternate on the reels are represented by gemstones to which thematically specific icons referring to the figure of the Joker are added.
In this slot machine, the numbers and letters of playing cards, which we find in practically all other games of this developer, are not present.
At the top of the main screen is the paytable, which can be consulted to discover the value of each symbol: the mask of the Joker is the one that pays the most, with a win equal to €50 for an alignment of five symbols, while the one with the lowest value is represented by the round dark blue gem, which pays a maximum of €1.
Bonus game
Despite the gameplay reduced to essentials, Joker Jewels offers a bonus game, activate thanks to the Scatter, in this case a red crown with the word Bonus. 
It is not a particularly complex bonus game, but it provides multipliers that are activated on the highest win, allowing the player to obtain even substantial winnings.
Slots similar to Joker Jewels
The figure of the Joker is famous in the world of slot machines and there are several software houses that propose it in their games.
Very similar to Joker Jewels both in terms of graphics and gameplay is Joker Gems: here too, gemstones and symbols related to the figure of the Joker alternate on the reels, in a simple and intuitive vintage game.
If you are looking for something more complex but still on the same theme, we suggest Mega Joker by Novomatic, a high-adrenaline game suitable for the most daring players: you can bet from a minimum of €0.20 up to a maximum of €100 per spin, for a total of 10 spins per session and it is also possible to risk everything on each win with the "Double or Nothing" function.

raw_translation.response:
Joker's Jewels

General Information:
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 5
Minimum Bet Amount: €0.01
Maximum Bet Amount: €25
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: High

Main Features:
If you love the old-school style of land-based slot machines but you're not particularly a fan of traditional fruit machines, then Joker's Jewels is the perfect game for you. It features the world of precious stones and the symbolism associated with the Joker, which has conquered generations of players.

This type of slot machine, which includes Joker Jewels, is not about flashy aesthetics or complexity. Instead, it values simplicity and features a linear design and intuitive gameplay. With an RTP of 96.5% and high volatility, this game is highly competitive when it comes to winnings.

Players can bet on each line with a number of coins ranging from one to ten, with a value between a minimum of 1 cent and a maximum of €0.50, for a total bet of up to €25 on all five lines.

Regular and Special Symbols in Joker Jewels:
The symbols that rotate on the reels are represented by precious stones, along with the theme-specific icons that refer to the figure of the Joker.

This slot machine doesn't feature numbers and letters from playing cards, which are found in practically all other games by this developer. At the top of the main screen is the paytable that can be consulted to discover the value of each symbol. The Joker mask pays the most, with a win of €50 for an alignment of five symbols, while the lowest value symbol is represented by the dark blue round gem, which pays a maximum of €1.

The Bonus Game:
Despite the reduced gameplay, Joker's Jewels offers a bonus game, activated by the scatter symbol, a red crown with the word "Bonus" written on it.

It's not a particularly elaborate bonus game, but it features multipliers that activate on the highest win, allowing the player to obtain even substantial payouts.

Similar Slots to Joker Jewels:
The figure of the Joker is famous in the world of slot machines, and several software houses propose it in their games. 

Joker Gems, which is very similar to Joker Jewels in terms of both graphics and gameplay, features precious stones and symbols related to the figure of the Joker, in a vintage and simple game.

If instead, you are looking for something more elaborate on the same theme, we suggest playing Mega Joker from Novomatic, a high-adrenaline game suitable for the most intrepid players. You can bet from a minimum of €0.20 up to a maximum of €100 per spin, for a total of 10 spins per session. Additionally, you can risk it all on every win with the "Double or Nothing" feature.

The slot machine has 5 reels and 5 paylines, with a minimum bet amount of €0.01 and a maximum of €25. The game has a high volatility and an impressive 96.5% return to player rate.

Review: Joker’s Jewels
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 5
Minimum bet amount: €0.01
Maximum bet amount: €25
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: high
Main features
If you love old land-based slot machines and their graphic and gameplay style, but you are not particularly fond of traditional Fruit Machines, here's another theme that has enchanted generations of players: the world of gemstones and the symbolism related to the figure of the Joker. This type of slot machine, to which Joker Jewels fully belongs, does not have showiness or complexity among its strong points, but rather simplicity is the most appreciated feature.
Therefore, linear graphics and very intuitive gameplay for a slot that, with a return to player (RTP) of 96.5% and a decidedly high volatility, is competitive in terms of winnings.
The player can bet on each line a number of coins ranging from one to 10, with a value ranging from a minimum of 1 cent to a maximum of €0.50, for a bet of up to €25 on all five lines.
Regular and special symbols of Joker Jewels
The symbols that alternate on the reels are represented by gemstones to which thematically specific icons referring to the figure of the Joker are added.
In this slot machine, the numbers and letters of playing cards, which we find in practically all other games of this developer, are not present.
At the top of the main screen is the paytable, which can be consulted to discover the value of each symbol: the mask of the Joker is the one that pays the most, with a win equal to €50 for an alignment of five symbols, while the one with the lowest value is represented by the round dark blue gem, which pays a maximum of €1.
Bonus game
Despite the gameplay reduced to essentials, Joker Jewels offers a bonus game, activate thanks to the Scatter, in this case a red crown with the word Bonus. 
It is not a particularly complex bonus game, but it provides multipliers that are activated on the highest win, allowing the player to obtain even substantial winnings.
Slots similar to Joker Jewels
The figure of the Joker is famous in the world of slot machines and there are several software houses that propose it in their games.
Very similar to Joker Jewels both in terms of graphics and gameplay is Joker Gems: here too, gemstones and symbols related to the figure of the Joker alternate on the reels, in a simple and intuitive vintage game.
If you are looking for something more complex but still on the same theme, we suggest Mega Joker by Novomatic, a high-adrenaline game suitable for the most daring players: you can bet from a minimum of €0.20 up to a maximum of €100 per spin, for a total of 10 spins per session and it is also possible to risk everything on each win with the "Double or Nothing" function.

Below is a review of the game "Joker’s Jewels".

Please provide an FAQ:

Review: Joker’s Jewels
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 5
Minimum bet amount: €0.01
Maximum bet amount: €25
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: high
Main features
If you love old land-based slot machines and their graphic and gameplay style, but you are not particularly fond of traditional Fruit Machines, here's another theme that has enchanted generations of players: the world of gemstones and the symbolism related to the figure of the Joker. This type of slot machine, to which Joker Jewels fully belongs, does not have showiness or complexity among its strong points, but rather simplicity is the most appreciated feature.
Therefore, linear graphics and very intuitive gameplay for a slot that, with a return to player (RTP) of 96.5% and a decidedly high volatility, is competitive in terms of winnings.
The player can bet on each line a number of coins ranging from one to 10, with a value ranging from a minimum of 1 cent to a maximum of €0.50, for a bet of up to €25 on all five lines.
Regular and special symbols of Joker Jewels
The symbols that alternate on the reels are represented by gemstones to which thematically specific icons referring to the figure of the Joker are added.
In this slot machine, the numbers and letters of playing cards, which we find in practically all other games of this developer, are not present.
At the top of the main screen is the paytable, which can be consulted to discover the value of each symbol: the mask of the Joker is the one that pays the most, with a win equal to €50 for an alignment of five symbols, while the one with the lowest value is represented by the round dark blue gem, which pays a maximum of €1.
Bonus game
Despite the gameplay reduced to essentials, Joker Jewels offers a bonus game, activate thanks to the Scatter, in this case a red crown with the word Bonus. 
It is not a particularly complex bonus game, but it provides multipliers that are activated on the highest win, allowing the player to obtain even substantial winnings.
Slots similar to Joker Jewels
The figure of the Joker is famous in the world of slot machines and there are several software houses that propose it in their games.
Very similar to Joker Jewels both in terms of graphics and gameplay is Joker Gems: here too, gemstones and symbols related to the figure of the Joker alternate on the reels, in a simple and intuitive vintage game.
If you are looking for something more complex but still on the same theme, we suggest Mega Joker by Novomatic, a high-adrenaline game suitable for the most daring players: you can bet from a minimum of €0.20 up to a maximum of €100 per spin, for a total of 10 spins per session and it is also possible to risk everything on each win with the "Double or Nothing" function.
